Profile.title: About me
Profile.descripcion: Hello! Well, I'll tell you... I started in web development a year ago starting with html, css and then Javascript; I focused on creating many projects and web pages to improve my logic and aesthetics, after that I focused 100% on Javascript and thus managed to learn a lot about the language so far.
